sentence: We should review all the new words before the test.
考试前我们应该复习所有新单词。
My sister loves to eat dark chocolate after dinner.
我妹妹喜欢在晚饭后吃黑巧克力。
My father works in a car factory near our town.
我父亲在我们镇附近的一家汽车厂工作。
The school trip to the museum was very exciting for everyone.
去博物馆的学校旅行对每个人来说都非常令人兴奋。
Math is the most difficult subject for me this term.
这学期数学对我来说是最难的科目。
The story about a magical forest is my favourite to read.
那个关于魔法森林的故事是我最喜欢读的。
The best part of my day is playing basketball with friends.
我一天中最好的部分是和朋友打篮球。
My school is on the other side of the park.
我的学校在公园的另一边。
There is a new library in the center of our small town.
我们小镇的中心新建了一个图书馆。
The kind boy often shares his lunch with the poor old man.
那个善良的男孩经常把他的午餐分给那位可怜的老人。
I will stay at my grandparents' house during the summer holiday.
暑假期间我会待在祖父母家。
She is the only student in our class who can play the violin.
她是我们班唯一会拉小提琴的学生。
The soup became too watery after I added more water.
我加了更多水后，汤变得太稀了。
My mother makes a delicious salad with fresh cabbage.
我妈妈用新鲜的卷心菜做美味的沙拉。
It was freezing cold when we went outside without coats.
我们没穿外套出去时，天气冷极了。
Please do not forget to bring your homework to school tomorrow.
请不要忘记明天把你的作业带到学校来。
Do not touch the hot stove because it is very dangerous.
不要触摸热炉子，因为它很危险。
I visit my cousin in the city once a month.
我每个月去城里看望我的表弟一次。
The room felt cold and sunless without any windows.
那个房间没有窗户，感觉又冷又暗。
You can choose any book you like from the school library.
你可以从学校图书馆选择任何你喜欢的书。
My mother packed everything we need for the picnic.
我妈妈打包了野餐所需的一切东西。
The cake tastes very rich because it has lots of butter.
这蛋糕尝起来很浓郁，因为它有很多黄油。
I need one more hour to complete my science project.
我需要再多一个小时来完成我的科学项目。
Her happy expression showed she liked the birthday present.
她快乐的表情显示她喜欢这个生日礼物。
Please read the passage on page ten and answer the questions.
请阅读第十页的文章并回答问题。
The teacher wrote a positive comment on my English essay.
老师在我的英语作文上写了一个积极的评语。
Her description of the accident was very clear and helpful.
她对事故的描述非常清晰且有用。
The theme of our school art exhibition is 'Nature and Cities'.
我们学校艺术展的主题是'自然与城市'。
I agree with you that summer is the best season of the year.
我同意你的看法，夏天是一年中最好的季节。
Each paragraph in your essay should have one main idea.
你文章中的每一个段落都应该有一个中心思想。
I did not understand the maths problem until my friend explained it.
直到我朋友解释后，我才理解了那道数学题。
Some students are playing football, and other students are reading.
一些学生在踢足球，其他学生在看书。
The story can help us relate to the feelings of the main character.
这个故事能帮助我们理解主人公的感受。
My first experience of camping was fun but also a little scary.
我第一次露营的经历很有趣，但也有点吓人。
In my opinion, reading books is more fun than watching TV.
在我看来，读书比看电视更有趣。
Our discussion topic for today is how to protect the environment.
我们今天讨论的话题是如何保护环境。
We learned some new grammar rules in our English class today.
今天我们在英语课上学了一些新的语法规则。
The most important rule in the library is to be quiet.
图书馆里最重要的规则是保持安静。
I need more time to finish drawing this picture for art class.
我需要更多时间来完成美术课的这幅画。
Please correct the spelling mistakes in your homework.
请改正你作业中的拼写错误。
We need to fill in a form to join the school chess club.
我们需要填一张表格才能加入学校国际象棋俱乐部。
My grandfather teaches me how to play chess every Sunday.
我爷爷每个星期天都教我下国际象棋。
Our class trip to the science museum is next Friday.
我们班去科学博物馆的旅行是在下周五。
I will post a letter to my pen pal in Canada tomorrow.
我明天要寄一封信给我在加拿大的笔友。
The dragon in the story protects a magical treasure in a cave.
故事中的龙保护着洞穴里的魔法宝藏。
I usually take a warm bath before going to bed at night.
我晚上睡觉前通常洗个热水澡。
We need to decide what game to play at the class party.
我们需要决定在班级派对上玩什么游戏。
My mother puts all the fresh fruit in a big basket.
我妈妈把所有新鲜水果都放在一个大篮子里。
The kind princess in the story helps all the poor people.
故事中善良的公主帮助了所有穷人。
The teacher showed us an example of a good book report.
老师给我们看了一份优秀读书报告的范例。
I believe that I can improve my English if I practice every day.
我相信如果我每天练习，我能提高我的英语水平。
We did a survey to find out our classmates' favourite sports.
我们做了一个调查来了解同学们最喜欢的运动。
The classroom was empty after all the students went home.
所有学生回家后，教室空无一人。
Do you know what will happen in the next chapter of the story?
你知道故事下一章会发生什么吗？
She gave a great presentation about her summer holiday.
她做了一个关于她暑假的精彩演讲。
My teacher always gives me positive advice about my studies.
我的老师总是给我的学习提出积极的建议。
The strong wind can blow the leaves off the trees in autumn.
秋天的大风能把树叶从树上吹落。
We saw big waves at the beach during the storm.
暴风雨期间我们在海滩上看到了巨浪。
She has a very soft voice when she reads stories to us.
她给我们读故事时声音非常轻柔。
I just finished my homework, so now I can watch TV.
我刚做完作业，所以现在可以看电视了。
My little brother dressed himself for school this morning.
我弟弟今天早上自己穿好衣服去上学。
It is a shame that the school sports day was cancelled because of rain.
很遗憾，学校运动会因为下雨取消了。
After a long walk, we finally reached the top of the hill.
走了很长一段路后，我们终于到达了山顶。
The cat jumped into the box and fell asleep quickly.
猫跳进箱子里很快就睡着了。
My father goes to the barber every month to cut his hair.
我父亲每个月都去理发店理发。
Be careful not to fall on the wet floor in the hallway.
小心别在走廊潮湿的地板上摔倒。
My bag is heavy, and it hurts my shoulder after a long walk.
我的包很重，走了一段长路后我的肩膀很痛。
The friendly shop assistant helped the customer find a book.
友善的店员帮助顾客找到了一本书。
I was very surprised to see my cousin at my school gate.
我很惊讶在学校门口看到我的表弟。
We use scissors to cut paper in our art and craft class.
我们在手工美术课上用剪刀剪纸。
My mother works in a small office near the train station.
我母亲在火车站附近的一间小办公室里工作。
I hope to receive a letter from my friend in America soon.
我希望能很快收到我美国朋友的来信。
Many people wear a ribbon to show support for cancer patients.
许多人佩戴丝带以示对癌症患者的支持。
The actor wore a funny red wig for the school play.
那位演员为学校戏剧戴了一顶滑稽的红色假发。
My sister is very smart and always gets good grades at school.
我妹妹很聪明，在学校总是取得好成绩。
A warm smile can make other people feel happy and welcome.
一个温暖的微笑能让别人感到快乐和受欢迎。
Last but not least, I want to thank my family for their help.
最后但同样重要的是，我要感谢我家人的帮助。
My uncle is training hard to run in the city marathon next month.
我叔叔正在为下个月的城市马拉松努力训练。
I like swimming; however, I am not very good at it yet.
我喜欢游泳；然而，我还不是很擅长。
It is raining, but I still want to go to the park with my friends.
天在下雨，但我仍然想和朋友们去公园。
The swimming pool at our school is twenty-five metres long.
我们学校的游泳池长二十五米。
Please stand in a straight line when we wait for the school bus.
等校车时，请站成一条直线。
After running, I stopped to take a deep breath and rest.
跑步后，我停下来深呼吸休息。
You need to hold your breath when you swim under the water.
在水下游泳时，你需要屏住呼吸。
I would like to visit the Great Wall of China one day.
我希望有一天能去参观中国的长城。
One con of living in a big city is the heavy traffic.
生活在大城市的一个缺点是交通拥堵。
I had a stomachache after eating too much ice cream.
我吃了太多冰淇淋后肚子疼。
Shall we go to the library to study for the test together?
我们一起去图书馆为考试学习好吗？
You can have either an apple or a banana for your snack.
你的点心可以吃一个苹果或者一根香蕉。
It is your choice to decide which book to read first.
由你选择先读哪本书。
You seem very happy today. Did something good happen?
你今天看起来很高兴。发生了什么好事吗？
I think someone is knocking on the door of our classroom.
我想有人在敲我们教室的门。
Neither my brother nor my sister likes to eat vegetables.
我弟弟和妹妹都不喜欢吃蔬菜。
We all cheer loudly when our school team wins a football match.
当我们校队赢得足球比赛时，我们都大声欢呼。
Remember to look both ways before you cross the street.
过马路前记得左右看看。
My grandfather says that learning is a lifelong journey.
我爷爷说学习是一生的旅程。
My dream is to become a scientist and discover new things.
我的梦想是成为一名科学家，发现新事物。
We learned about life in the past in our history class today.
今天的历史课上我们学习了过去的生活。
She set a new school record for the one hundred metre race.
她创造了一百米赛跑的新校记录。
None of the students in our class failed the English exam.
我们班没有一个学生英语考试不及格。
I am a member of the school reading club and we meet every week.
我是学校阅读俱乐部的成员，我们每周都见面。
Wait a moment, please. I need to tie my shoe first.
请稍等片刻。我需要先系鞋带。
If it is sunny tomorrow, we will have a picnic in the park.
如果明天天气晴朗，我们将在公园里野餐。
Please finish your homework as soon as possible.
请尽快完成你的作业。
The main purpose of this meeting is to plan the class trip.
这次会议的主要目的是计划班级旅行。
We want to raise money to buy new books for the school library.
我们想筹钱为学校图书馆购买新书。
Our school holds a charity run to help sick children every year.
我们学校每年都举办慈善跑步来帮助生病的孩子。
My parents always encourage me to try my best in everything.
我的父母总是鼓励我在每件事上都尽力而为。
My mother teaches me how to cook simple meals on weekends.
我妈妈在周末教我如何做简单的饭菜。
I wrote a note to remind myself about the meeting after school.
我写了一张便条提醒自己放学后开会。
We must not talk loudly during the film in the cinema.
在电影院看电影时，我们不可以大声说话。
You should consider joining the art club because you draw well.
你应该考虑加入美术俱乐部，因为你画得很好。
Both my brother and I enjoy playing computer games together.
我弟弟和我都喜欢一起玩电脑游戏。
Be careful! The heavy stone will sink in the water quickly.
小心！那块重石头会很快沉入水中。
When I started to learn English, it was a sink or swim situation.
当我开始学英语时，那是一种要么成功要么失败的局面。
As it is getting late, we should all go home now.
天色渐晚，我们现在都应该回家了。
The brave surfer rode a very high wave at the beach.
那个勇敢的冲浪者在海滩上驾驭了一个很高的浪。
We learned that a shark has many sharp teeth in science class.
我们在科学课上学到鲨鱼有很多锋利的牙齿。
The small dog will not attack people if you do not scare it.
如果你不吓它，那只小狗不会攻击人。
I nearly missed the school bus because I woke up late.
我差点错过校车，因为我起晚了。
Plants will die if they do not get enough water and sunlight.
如果得不到足够的水和阳光，植物就会死亡。
The sur- in 'surface' means the top or outside part.
'表面'中的'sur-'意思是顶部或外部。
There is a drawing competition in our school next week.
下周我们学校有一场绘画比赛。
Let's compare these two maps to see which one is better.
我们来比较一下这两张地图，看看哪一张更好。
Winning the race was a great achievement for the young runner.
赢得比赛对那位年轻的跑步者来说是一项巨大的成就。
The surfer carried his surfboard to the beach every morning.
那个冲浪者每天早上都把他的冲浪板带到海滩。
I love to ride my bicycle along the river after school.
我喜欢放学后沿着河边骑自行车。
My uncle is a nature lover and he often goes hiking in the mountains.
我叔叔是一个自然爱好者，他经常去山里徒步。
She won a gold medal in the school swimming competition.
她在学校游泳比赛中赢得了一枚金牌。
The athlete showed us the silver medal he won in the race.
那位运动员向我们展示他在比赛中赢得的银牌。
My parents are proud of me when I help others.
当我帮助别人时，我的父母为我感到骄傲。
Eating healthy food and exercising can help you stay fit.
吃健康食品和锻炼能帮助你保持健康。
We are studying hard for our final exams next month.
我们正在为下个月的期末考试努力学习。
Our school basketball team practices every Tuesday and Thursday.
我们学校篮球队每周二和周四训练。
Even young children can learn to use a computer these days.
如今，即使是小孩子也能学会使用电脑。
My cold is worse today, so I need to stay at home and rest.
我今天感冒更严重了，所以我需要呆在家里休息。
You must pay attention to the teacher when she is speaking.
老师讲话时你必须注意听。
The rain will continue for the rest of the day, so stay inside.
雨会持续下到今天结束，所以待在室内吧。
The brave firefighter saved the cat from the tall tree.
那位勇敢的消防员从高高的树上救下了那只猫。
We need to take action to keep our school clean and tidy.
我们需要采取行动来保持我们学校的干净整洁。
We should use words, not fists, to fight against unfair things.
我们应该用言语，而不是拳头，来对抗不公平的事情。
What was the final score in yesterday's football match?
昨天足球比赛的最终比分是多少？
My main goal this term is to improve my English speaking skills.
我这学期的主要目标是提高我的英语口语技能。
Our team celebrated its victory with juice and cookies.
我们队用果汁和饼干庆祝胜利。
The old path will lead you to a beautiful small lake.
这条旧小路会引你到一个美丽的小湖。
We have an international food festival at our school every year.
我们学校每年都有一个国际美食节。
This is a good chance for you to make new friends at camp.
这是你在营地结交新朋友的好机会。
Reading English books every day can help improve your vocabulary.
每天读英文书可以帮助你提高词汇量。
We used old boxes to create a model spaceship for science class.
我们用旧盒子为科学课制作了一个宇宙飞船模型。
I wonder what life was like for children one hundred years ago.
我想知道一百年前孩子们的生活是什么样的。
Hard work is often the key to success in school and in life.
努力通常是学校和生活中取得成功的关键。
Can you explain how to solve this maths problem to me?
你能给我解释一下如何解这道数学题吗？
The teacher gave us simple instructions for the science experiment.
老师给了我们简单的科学实验说明。
My best friend and I have the same favourite colour - blue.
我最好的朋友和我有相同的最喜欢的颜色——蓝色。
It takes courage to stand up and speak in front of the whole class.
在全班同学面前站起来发言需要勇气。
Look ahead on the road when you are riding your bicycle.
骑自行车时要看前方路面。
Our school spirit is very strong during the sports competition.
体育比赛期间，我们的学校精神非常高昂。
My grandmother makes the most delicious cookies in the world.
我祖母做的饼干是世界上最美味。
I am certain that I locked the door when I left the house.
我确定我离开家时锁了门。
That blue pencil case on the desk is mine, not yours.
桌上那个蓝色铅笔盒是我的，不是你的。
For dinner, we often have rice with beef and vegetables.
晚餐我们经常吃米饭配牛肉和蔬菜。
Rabbits love to eat fresh carrots from the garden.
兔子喜欢吃花园里的新鲜胡萝卜。
Some people prefer to eat mutton instead of pork or beef.
有些人喜欢吃羊肉而不是猪肉或牛肉。
Eating too much food with a lot of fat is not healthy.
吃太多富含脂肪的食物不健康。
The brown hen lays an egg almost every morning.
那只褐色的母鸡几乎每天早上都下一个蛋。
My mother uses a big pot to cook soup for our family.
我妈妈用一个大锅给我们家煮汤。
We need to chop one onion to put into the meat sauce.
我们需要切一个洋葱放进肉酱里。
I like to eat pancakes with honey for breakfast on Sundays.
我喜欢在星期天早餐吃煎饼配蜂蜜。
On cold mornings, a bowl of warm porridge is very nice.
在寒冷的早晨，一碗热粥非常棒。
This orange is very sweet and tastes like summer sunshine.
这个橙子很甜，尝起来像夏日的阳光。
I prefer to eat plain rice instead of fried rice sometimes.
我有时更喜欢吃白米饭而不是炒饭。
Let's look at the menu to decide what to order for lunch.
我们看看菜单来决定午餐点什么。
If you have a fever, you should take some medicine and rest.
如果你发烧了，你应该吃点药并休息。
My sister is two years younger than me.
我妹妹比我小两岁。
You need to take one small pill with water after meals.
你需要饭后用温水服用一粒小药片。
Only ten minutes remain before the end of the school day.
离放学只剩下十分钟了。
I finished my first book, so I started to read another one.
我读完了第一本书，所以开始读另一本。
There is a strong connection between eating well and good health.
健康饮食和身体健康之间有密切的联系。
Your high test scores prove that you studied very hard.
你考试的高分证明了你学习非常努力。
The two houses look very similar because they were built together.
这两栋房子看起来非常相似，因为它们是一起建的。
My birthday is a special day for me and my family.
我的生日对我和我的家人来说是一个特殊的日子。
Please put these history books in order by their year.
请把这些历史书按年份顺序排列。
My favourite dessert is apple pie with a little ice cream.
我最喜欢的甜点是配一点冰淇淋的苹果派。
I make a cheese sandwich to take to school for lunch.
我做了一个奶酪三明治带到学校当午餐。
We sat in a circle on the floor to play the game.
我们在地板上坐成一圈玩游戏。
I like to scramble eggs with tomatoes for a quick breakfast.
我喜欢把鸡蛋和西红柿炒在一起作为快捷早餐。
Can you slice the bread for our sandwiches, please?
请你把面包切成片做我们的三明治好吗？
You need to beat the eggs well before you make the cake.
做蛋糕前你需要把鸡蛋打好。
Add a little salt to the soup to make it taste better.
在汤里加一点盐使它味道更好。
Too much salt in your food is not good for your health.
食物中盐太多对你的健康不好。
Some people like to put black pepper on their noodles.
有些人喜欢在他们的面条上放黑胡椒。
We use vegetable oil to cook food in our home.
我们家用植物油烹饪食物。
Heat the oil in the pan before you put the vegetables in.
在把蔬菜放进锅里之前，先把油在锅里加热。
Stir the mixture of flour and eggs until it is smooth.
搅拌面粉和鸡蛋的混合物直到它变得顺滑。
You need to stir the soup slowly so it does not burn.
你需要慢慢搅拌汤，这样它就不会烧糊。
Cook the rice until all the water is gone.
煮米饭直到所有水都消失。
Bake the cake until the top is golden brown.
烘烤蛋糕直到顶部变成金棕色。
Put the hot food on a plate and let it cool for a minute.
把热的食物放在盘子上，让它冷却一分钟。
The music at the school party was too loud for me.
学校聚会的音乐对我来说太吵了。
The heat from the sun made the sand very warm.
太阳的热量使沙子变得很温暖。
I followed a simple recipe to make chocolate cookies.
我按照一个简单的食谱做巧克力饼干。
Flour is the main ingredient for making bread.
面粉是做面包的主要原料。
The first step in washing your hands is to use soap and water.
洗手的第一步是使用肥皂和水。
A healthy diet includes lots of fruit and vegetables.
健康的饮食包括大量的水果和蔬菜。
My family sometimes goes to a restaurant for dinner on Friday.
我家有时周五去餐馆吃晚饭。
I eat a green salad with my lunch almost every day.
